mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUILD_JOIN(joinName, joinNickname, joinAge, joinSex, joinRecommend, joinLastguild, joinIp, joinDate, joinStatus, joinRetestdat) VALUES(#{joinName}, #{joinNickname}, #{joinAge}, #{joinSex}, #{joinRecommend}, #{joinLastguild}, #{joinIp}, curdate(), #{joinStatus}, #{joinRetestdat});
